title: Marinated tomato salad
ingredients: ['8 large tomatoes, cut into wedges', '2 red onions, cut into wedges and separated', '2 onions, cut into wedges and separated', '2 cucumbers, peeled and diced', '250ml olive oil', '4 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 tablespoon finely chopped garlic', '2 teaspoons finely chopped fresh oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces', '2 hard-boiled eggs, sliced', '8 anchovy fillets (optional)']
